root.message: The REL_CAL_POLICY field for indicator 10-7-3, translated into en
root.data: Disaggregated, incident-based data collected by the Missing Migrants Project is updated on a daily basis and is uploaded to missingmigrants.iom.int twice weekly, typically on Tuesdays and Fridays. The aggregated SDG 10.7.3 dataset us updated annually.
